We provide a helper method which aims to make plotting indicators simple. For further information on the charting API please see our Charting section.

private CoppockCurve _cc;
// In Initialize()
_cc = CC(symbol);

// In OnData()
if (_cc.IsReady)
{
    Plot("My Indicators", "CC Is Ready", _cc.IsReady);
    Plot("My Indicators", "CC Warm Up Period", _cc.WarmUpPeriod);
    Plot("My Indicators", "CC Current", _cc.Current);
    Plot("My Indicators", "CC Name", _cc.Name);
    Plot("My Indicators", "CC Samples", _cc.Samples);
}
# In Initialize()
self.cc = self.CC(symbol)

# In OnData()
if self.cc.IsReady:
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "CC Is Ready", self.cc.IsReady);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "CC Warm Up Period", self.cc.WarmUpPeriod);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "CC Current", self.cc.Current);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "CC Name", self.cc.Name);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "CC Samples", self.cc.Samples);
}
